name: Tikta
description:
Story:

After the Inuit-story "Tikta'liktak". 

A boy wakes up lost, away from his Tribe and needs to find his way back home with the help of spirit animals but not all spirits are peaceful minded towards him.

The world is centered around the arctic culture. It mixes the cold, icy & lonely atmosphere of the arctic with the fantastical, mystic & spiritual world of the Inuit cultures and sagas.

Controls:

How to download:

  • Download the zip file that's appropriate for your operating system.
  • Double click the downloaded zip file. This either opens it up in Explorer or whatever Zip Program you have installed (WinZip, WinRAR etc.)
  • Right click in the middle of your opened window and select Extract All
  • Choose an installation location of your choice.
  • Run the a game from the folder you extracted it to!
